channel.title: RSCNude PK in Development. Wanna PK in Nudity Mode?
channel.description:
RSCNude PK is a server in development and will be out within a few weeks hopefully
Here's a pic of RSCNude PK, dev only started today.
http://imageshack.us/f/96/lolzsx.jpg/
http://imageshack.us/f/267/shortsw.jpg/
Adidas shorts FTW?
This will be a X Rated RSC Server more pics soon. Players must be 18+ to play. (LOL).
This is a serious server and will be out soon so stay tuned!
PK IN NUDITY MODE!
Ideas:
Grow a boner for 5 minutes when you PK someone Make womens breasts bigger
Think of more soon.
-MubbY-

item.title: RSCNude PK in Development. Wanna PK in Nudity Mode?
item.dc:creator: @NotMubbY NotMubbY
item.description:
@NotMubbY wrote:

verse905:

lol[/quote][quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:15, topic:433464”]I LOLDMYASSOFF at the shorts.[/quote][quote=“SamanthaSoul, post:14, topic:433464”]I’d play this.

Good to see some people can see that this was a fucking pure troll.

[quote=“waj, post:4, topic:433464”]Grow up Mubby,

Also you are not 18 yourself, which means you can’t play, sorry.[/quote][quote="-Nothing, post:9, topic:433464"]Mubby…You are a fucking retarded.

Btw. If it’s 18+…Then you aren’t even allowed to play it yourself…[/quote][quote=“NoLives, post:10, topic:433464”]Sweet god have mercy on this kids soul.[/quote]

How can any of you guys even say shit to me?

  1. Y So Serious
  2. I’m not the one that STILL plays RSC
  3. This is a dream fantasy server for all you RSC Nerds and are serious on the internet 24/7. You’d love to grow a boner in RSC when you PK someone, since that’s what you do in RL also. You’d wank over this game no doubt. You’d love it if you could wank and PK at the same fucking time…
  4. Get a life? Oh yeah because I’m the one who still plays this shit.

GoodMotherFuckinFight

Read full topic
